item.title: TryHackMe: Juicy Details Writeup
item.description: Play Task 1. Reconnaissance What tools did the attacker use? (Order by the occurrence in the log) Explore the file access.log. We see the following, in order: nmap hydra sqlmap curl feroxbuster Check the last part of the line. For example, the hydra tool uses the (Hydra) marker at the end. sqlmap similarly has (http://sqlmap.org). What endpoint was vulnerable to a brute-force attack? In access.log we check the endpoint where Hydra is being used.
